topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1952–1954, Iran, 1951–1954, Second Edition
topic.body: Part of a sub-series that documents the foreign policies of the Harry S. Truman and Dwight D. Eisenhower administrations, this volume focuses on their respective policies toward Iran. This second edition incorporates Documents 148 and 149, released after the original declassification of the first edition in 2017.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1952–1954, Iran, 1951–1954, Second Edition
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
